snippet: LeBron and I never actually made it to the 100-meter hurdles. We got stuck at ExCel Center and saw how Anna Laurell and Naomi-Lee Fischer-Rasmussen got in a really bad fight. Security was on top of it, though.
abstract: LeBron and I never actually made it to the 100-meter hurdles. We got stuck at ExCel Center and saw how Anna Laurell and Naomi-Lee Fischer-Rasmussen got in a really bad fight. Security was on top of it, though.

byline.original: By JON HUANG and CHRISTOPH NIEMANN
